page.title: 19NIGHTLIFE FOR THE ADULTS
page.content: These days it seems that many adults spend a lot of time in the Pub. Hull is a funny place for Pubs as there are only 3 main breweries who own most of them; Bass, Tetleys and North Country. This last one has been taken over by the Mansfield Brewery. But what happens after closing time, there is a choice of clubs ranging from Romeos and Juliets to the Waterfront club, there is also a casino. For those who like Cinema there are 2 multi-screen cinemas plus the Hull film theatre based at the Central Library. Theatre is represented by the New Theatre which is undergoing a multi- million pound refit at the moment. And lastly the Spring Street theatre home of the Hull Truck theatre company.
